messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] HEM
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/12/2004 11:08:10 AM Eastern Daylight Time, odrade7@yahoo.com writes: her  response to me saying that I was offended by her followers
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/12/2004 11:08:10 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
odrade7@... writes:

her response to me saying that I was
offended by her "followers" statement was "most people
are". LOL<<<

*I*'m not! <G>

I'm a Doddite! A Doddhead. A Sandranista! <G> And proud of it.

Of course, Sandra HATES that! <G>

So, get screwed, Helen!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: HEM
messages.msgSnippet: ... [ If you have a problem with the content of the magazine you must just be one of her unthinking followers, so who needs you.  You are too dumb and
messages.messageBody:
--- AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com wrote:

[ If you have a problem with the content of the
magazine you must just be one of her unthinking
followers, so who needs you. You are too dumb
and brainwashed by her to see that the rest of us
are better Unschoolers anyway.]

I received the same reply back from Helen and wrote
back to her basically saying the same thing that you
wrote (above) and her response to me saying that I was
offended by her "followers" statement was "most people
are". LOL

Anyhow, I'm glad that these Yahoo groups exist and
that there are other 'zines out there for unschoolers.

-Tracy-
